name: Tandemaus
flavorText: Exhibiting great teamwork, they use their incisors to cut pieces out of any material that might be useful for a nest, then make off with them.

previous.name: Pawmot
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies with lightning-fast movements.
